Exploring modern web development practices with React and TypeScript.

Modern web development has evolved dramatically over the past decade. Today's applications demand not just functionality, but exceptional user experience, performance, and maintainability. This guide explores building modern web apps with React and TypeScript.
for UI components and state management

Vite has become the default choice for new React projects, replacing Create React App:

npm create vite@latest my-app -- --template react-ts
cd my-app
npm install
npm run dev
Build complex UIs by composing simple, focused components:
. Don't reach for global state prematurely:
Data is needed across many components
Group by feature, not by type
Server-side rendering with Next.js or Remix
Form handling with React Hook Form
